description: Defines volume tracking and consumption properties for containers that hold liquids.

currentVolumeMilliliters.description: Current volume of liquid in the container (in milliliters).

maxCapacityMilliliters.description: Maximum capacity of the container (in milliliters).

servingSizeMilliliters.description: Standard serving size when drinking from container (in milliliters).

isRefillable.description: Whether the container can be refilled after being emptied.

flavorText.description: Descriptive text displayed to actors when consuming from this container.
